TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MsalDistributedTokenCacheAdapter extends Microsoft.Identity.Web.TokenCacheProviders.MsalAbstractTokenCacheProvider

Docs.summary: An implementation of the token cache for both Confidential and Public clients backed by a Distributed Cache. The Distributed Cache (L2), by default creates a Memory Cache (L1), for faster look up, resulting in a two level cache.
